thought: I need to set the parameters for the openWeatherMap currentWeather action to fetch the weather for Austin using cityName and metric units.
plan: Set format to 'metric' for Celsius and meter/sec units.
Test the action to ensure it fetches the correct weather data.
criticism: The current action_0 has no parameters set, so it won't fetch any weather data. Setting these parameters is essential to get the correct data.
